title: President Donald J. Trump Signs H.R. 274 into Law – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Land & Agriculture	

Issued on:
May 16, 2017
On Tuesday, May 16, 2017, the President signed into law:H.R. 274, the “Modernizing Government Travel Act,” which requires the General Services Administration to prescribe regulations to provide for the reimbursement for the use of a transportation network company or innovative mobility technology company by any Federal employee traveling on official business.
